name: flickr.photos.getFavorites
description: Returns the list of people who have favorited a given photo.
authentication: This method does not require authentication.

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: photo_id
arguments.description: The ID of the photo to fetch the favoriters list for.

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

arguments.name: per_page
arguments.description: Number of usres to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 10. The maximum allowed value is 50.

response:
<photo id="1253576" secret="81b96be690" server="1" farm="1" page="1" pages="3" perpage="10" total="27">

errors.title: Photo not foundThe specified photo does not exist, or the calling user does not have permission to view it.
Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.
Service currently unavailableThe requested service is temporarily unavailable.
Write operation failedThe requested operation failed due to a temporary issue.

Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
